section.title: Communication
section.para: There are components in CMM, for example Apache Storm, that require a Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) that absolutely and uniquely identifies the corresponding host machine in your CMM environment.

Before installing CMM, it is therefore required to define the mapping of IP addresses, host names, and FQDNs. You can either specify the DNS, or you can map your IP addresses in the /etc/hosts file on your CMM host.
